wikipedia_page.main: Walter Pilling (18 April 1935 – June 1999) was a British wrestler. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics.He also represented England and won a silver medal in 57 kg bantamweight division, at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia.
